name: Liath
description:
My Submission for the GameDevTv Game Jam

Made in the last 24 hours of the jam and i'm proud with what i've done in that time limit.

Couldn't get my idea fully in the game which was a fighter that is more powerful when remaining young and he needed to offer his soul and be resurrected to stay young .

Also i've noticed that the game has more buggy / worst movement after i built it and i couldn't fix it before they close submissions so apologies for that..

But i hope you enjoy playing/testing it out! ^^  

you can download either the open source file for the project (made in unity) or the setup for the game.

Credits:LittleRobotSoundFactory-https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/321035/
